name: umt-group
description: UMT Group Website mit Tailwind und Alpine.js
author: schwarzdesign

scripts.copy:js:dev: copyfiles -f src/js/alpine.min.js public/assets/js/ && copyfiles -f src/js/alpine.focus.min.js public/assets/js/ && copyfiles -f src/js/dark-mode.js public/assets/js/ && copyfiles -f src/js/page-nav.js public/assets/js/
scripts.copy:js:prod: copyfiles -f src/js/alpine.min.js public/assets/js/ && copyfiles -f src/js/alpine.focus.min.js public/assets/js/ && copyfiles -f src/js/dark-mode.js public/assets/js/ && copyfiles -f src/js/page-nav.js public/assets/js/
scripts.build: npm run copy:js:prod && npm run build:default && npm run build:dynamic
scripts.watch: npm run copy:js:dev && npm-run-all --parallel watch:default watch:dynamic
